organizations: F.C. Dallas of Major League Soccer
lead_paragraph: F.C. Dallas of Major League Soccer fired Coach Steve Morrow after losing its last four games, including a 5-1 thumping by the Los Angeles Galaxy on Sunday.
snippet: F.C. Dallas of Major League Soccer fired Coach Steve Morrow after losing its last four games, including a 5-1 thumping by the Los Angeles Galaxy on Sunday.
